articles.title: Scotland pull off impressive thrashing of West Indies in T20 World Cup
articles.description:
• Scotland 160-5; West Indies 118 all out
  • George Munsey’s unbeaten 66 key to Hobart victory
Scotland claimed one of the greatest wins in their history, upsetting the odds at the T20 World Cup as they beat West Indies by 42 runs at Hobar…
articles.content:
Scotland claimed one of the most impressive wins in their history, upsetting the odds at the T20 World Cup again as they beat West Indies by 42 runs at Hobart.
